document_data.mainbody:
ream was a common species of panfish that inhabited several regions on both salt and freshwater bodies of water, including the Lake Glorfindar in the Starmetal Hills and remained active through the winter months under the lakes ice.
Brown bream was a cold climate freshwater species of bream. They were small and flat bony brown animals with delicious flesh.
They were edible and were a part of a winters heros feasts served during the annual Simril celebration in Twilight Tor. The feast also consisted of cooked brown bream, blackjaw, and candlefish.
Bream meat was mashed with flour and shaped into "bream balls" â€“ a quality bait used by icefishers of Twilight Tor.
